reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of NURS 300, NURS 310, NURS 321, NURS 330.
Co-reqs: NURS 346.
courseName: Nursing Practice with Infants, Children, Youth and their Families: Practicum
description: Clinical practice to integrate and consolidate professional nursing knowledge, skills and competencies in the care of infants, children, youth and their families. Students who take NURS 366 cannot earn credit for NURS 334 or NURS 423.
